additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Reconstituted Juices (Apple 29%, Blackcurrant 1%), Sugar, Food Acid (Citric Acid), Natural Flavours, Natural Colours (163).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: This cap contains small parts not suitable for unsupervised children under 36 months. Do not re-use.

description: Pop Tops Fruit Drink Apple Blackcurrant contains 30% fruit juice with no preservatives, no artificial colours, flavours and sweeteners.30% Fruit JuiceNo PreservativesNo Artificial Colours, Flavours or Sweeteners
